About 271 Dartmouth St Unit 4I

Stunning corner one bedroom home in an elevator building ideally located in a prime Back Bay location. Bright & sunny throughout, this gorgeous condo offers a fabulous floor-plan. The living room features a handsome fireplace, beautiful built-ins, and a wonderful alcove, perfect for dining or an at home work space. The eat-in kitchen showcases a large window overlooking Newbury Street. The bedroom is incredibly spacious with a large closet and an en-suite bathroom. Other notable features include beautiful hardwood floors, high ceilings, & ample storage throughout. This professionally managed building features two elevators, laundry on every floor, and a magnificent common roof deck with sweeping views. Central Back Bay location on the corner of Dartmouth Street and Newbury Street - close to the T, bus & commuter rail stops, Copley Square, Prudential, and just steps to Newbury Street's fantastic shops and restaurants. Unit rented until 8/31/24.
